definition[0]: money, property etc that you receive from someone who has died
example[0]: Lucinda has to fight for her life and her inheritance in this gripping novel.
definition[1]: physical or mental qualities that you inherit from your family
example[1]: Our genetic inheritance cannot be changed.
definition[2]: ideas, skills, literature etc from the past that influence people in the present
example[2]: ideas that have become part of our cultural inheritance
definition[3]: money, property, or other things that become yours after someone has died
example[3]: people who suddenly have large lump sums to invest, perhaps from an inheritance
